message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $180.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $140.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $160.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer at $150.
Hi Bob, I'm glad we're still in the negotiation. I'm willing to be flexible, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $165.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I would like to counter your offer at $155.
Hi Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting close. I'm willing to meet you at $160, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $162.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter your offer at $157.5.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go much lower than my previous offer. I'm willing to meet you at $162.50, but I'm not budging from there. I'm counteroffering at $162.50
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offers. I would like to counter your offer at $160.
